option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: #!/bin/bash DOCS_DIR="./docs" IMAGES_DIR="./images" PLANTUML_CMD="plantuml" # Ensure plantuml is installed CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff --name-only HEAD | grep "^${DOCS_DIR}.*\.puml$") if [ -z "$CHANGED_FILES" ]; then echo "No .puml files changed." exit 0 fi for file in $CHANGED_FILES; do OUTPUT_FILE="${IMAGES_DIR}/$(basename "${file%.puml}.png")" echo "Generating PNG for $file -> $OUTPUT_FILE" mkdir -p "$IMAGES_DIR" $PLANTUML_CMD -tpng "$file" -o "$IMAGES_DIR" || exit 1 done
